doc.after: The third edition was translated and published into English in 31 volumes between 1974 and 1983 by Macmillan Publishers Each volume was translated separately requiring use of the index found at the front of each volume to locate specific items knowledge of Russian can be helpful to find the right volume the first time Not all entries were translated into English these are indicated in the index Articles from the English edition are made available online by TheFreeDictionary com 7
